CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Senior Care Group relative to Emergency Room Patients?
SRP.A: Senior Care Group is {above} Emergency Room Patients in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Emergency Room Patients relative to Chronic Condition Patients?
SRP.A: Emergency Room Patients is {below} Chronic Condition Patients in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Wellness Program Participants relative to Emergency Room Patients?
SRP.A: Wellness Program Participants is {above} Emergency Room Patients in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total patient satisfaction?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Wellness Program Participants}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total patient satisfaction?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Emergency Room Patients}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Acute Care Patients's maximum Patient Satisfaction in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Acute Care Patients's maximum Patient Satisfaction is in {2000}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Chronic Condition Patients's minimum Patient Satisfaction in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Chronic Condition Patients's minimum Patient Satisfaction is in {1994}.

NC.Q: Between 1997 and 2001, was the average total Patient Satisfaction higher or lower than between 2001 and 2003?
NC.A: The average total patient satisfaction between 1997 and 2001 was {lower} than between 2001 and 2003.

NC.Q: Was the total Patient Satisfaction in 1994 higher or lower than in 2004?
NC.A: The total patient satisfaction in 1994 was {higher} than in 2004.

NC.Q: Between 1999 and 2003, did the total Patient Satisfaction experience a larger or smaller change than between 1998 and 2000?
NC.A: The change in total patient satisfaction between 1999 and 2003 was {smaller} than between 1998 and 2000.

NC.Q: Between 1994 and 2004, did the total Patient Satisfaction experience a larger or smaller change than between 1994 and 2002?
NC.A: The change in total patient satisfaction between 1994 and 2004 was {smaller} than between 1994 and 2002.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Outpatient Visitors} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Chronic Condition Patients and Acute Care Patients first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Chronic Condition Patients and Acute Care Patients first exchanged leading positions in {1995}.
